components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery across Real-time Transcription, Conversation Relay, and Voice Gather, following remediation efforts implemented by our Speech-to-Text (STT) vendor, Google. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Speech Recognition
PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - ConversationRelay

incident_updates.body: We've identified an issue affecting Real-time Transcription, Conversation Relay, and Voice Gather, caused by elevated latency from our Speech-to-Text (STT) vendor, Google. Their team is working to isolate and resolve the problem, and we're actively coordinating with them. STT services not using Google remain fully operational. We'll share another update in 4 hours or sooner as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Speech Recognition
PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - ConversationRelay

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue RealtimeTranscription, ConversationRelay, and Voice Gather Degraded. The Twilio team has identified the problem to a spike in latency in our STT vendor (Google). Their engineering team is currently working to isolate and remediate the problem. Twilio team is actively communicating with the Google team to resolve the problem. We expect to provide another update in 2 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Speech Recognition
PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - ConversationRelay

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue RealtimeTranscription, ConversationRelay, and Voice Gather Degraded. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Speech Recognition
PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - ConversationRelay

incident_updates.body: Our engineers have identified the issue RealtimeTranscription, ConversationRelay, and Voice Gather Degraded. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Speech Recognition

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Gather speech TCBT tests failing. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio's Numbers in Chile

incident_updates.body: We are observing call failures to a subset of Twilio's numbers in Chile. We are currently working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Voice, Latin America

incidents.name: Delay in Voice Call Pricing Updates

incident_updates.body: Our Engineering team has identified the problem causing the delay in updating Voice pricing for calls.  The team has implemented the remediations and are starting to see recovery.  We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Voice REST API

incident_updates.body: We are currently experiencing a delay in updating voice call pricing. Our engineers are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. As a result, customers may not see updated prices for calls, recordings, and transcriptions at this time. We will provide an update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: PROGRAMMABLE VOICE - Voice REST API

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing a delay in voice call pricing updates. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide an update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Verizon Wireless

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Verizon Wireless United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 28 July 2025 at 21:00 PDT until 29 July 2025 at 01:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Verizon Wireless United States customers.

Impacted Product: Verify Silent Network Auth

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

We are aware of the short notice and are working with our Carrier Partners to provide earlier notification where possible.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Twilio Flex - Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Were conducting a planned maintenance in all regions between 9:00 PM PST to 11:59PM Pacific Time on 07/29/2025. During the maintenance window, the team will be migrating data to the new cluster. There will be two cluster reboots (about 10 seconds each) during this time. Customers may experience the following during the two cluster reboots:

-Login failures for customers logging in via legacy SSO (customers with enhanced SSO are not impacted) or console.

-Customers that are already logged in may be logged out from Flex UI or webchat.

-Customers using webchat may be unable initiate new sessions or see disruptions to their existing sessions (token refresh failure).

Customers should be able re-login after the impact period in case of login failure during the maintenance window.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Japan Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a planned maintenance from 07 August 2025 at 06:00 PDT until 07 August 2025 at 11:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Twilio Japan phone numbers for a maximum duration of 100 minutes per block.

This maintenance will impact approximately 6000 phone numbers and downtime will occur in one of the following blocks depending on the applicable national (050) number:

Downtime 1: 22:00 JST August 7 (06:00 PDT August 7) for 100 minutes
Downtime 2: 00:00 JST August 8 (08:00 PDT August 7) for 100 minutes
Downtime 3: 02:00 JST August 8 (10:00 PDT August 7) for 70 minutes

For any inquiries about your impacted phone numbers time slots, please reach out to your Twilio Account Manager or create a ticket via https://help.twilio.com/submit
